MIXMACHINE_GUIDE_201:
In order to fuse monsters together, you'll need two or more monsters, 
and they all must be at least Level 10.
ā
The child will be born with some of its
parents' skills.
ā
And it's possible it will get half of
the skill points from each parent.
ā
And this is how synthesized monsters
can get stronger than their parents, ……
ā
But the downside is that the parents
will vanish too.
ā
You should tihnk about your party's
balance before you fuse.
ā
MIXMACHINE_GUIDE_211:
Sometimes, during fusion, the child will earn a positive value in its species.
ā
Monsters with a high enough "plus rank"
will get various benefits.
ā
Their maximum level will increase,
and new traits unlocked, ……
ā
And their monster rank will increase
by some number.
ā
The monster will take the total
"plus rank" of the fused parents.
ā
Also "plus rank" will increase
significantly at level 31 and 76.
ā
You should think about their levels
when you choose monsters to fuse.
ā
MIXMACHINE_GUIDE_221:
Main means to Scout monsters is to use the Scout Attack.
ā
Using meat items have the effect
of increasing the Scout success rate.
ā
But there are other effective methods.
ā
Success rate will increase as a
monster's attacks get stronger.
ā
And so you should use Sapperine
and Oomph beforehand, ……
ā
and build up tension before doing
a Scout Attack to increase its success.
ā
MIXMACHINE_GUIDE_231:
Fellow monsters will obey a Scout's orders during battle, but...
ā
Monsters with tactics can fight
effectively on their own.
ā
To change Tactics, if press Up on the
D-Pad, the cursor will be on the upper screen……
ā
you can change tactics for all allies
at once. It's really useful, remember it!
ā
MIXMACHINE_GUIDE_241:
Synthesis and Super Synthesis are
available when "plus rank" is 100.
ā
Monsters born via Super Synthesis
are SS Rank, and have greater potential.
ā
And they can get an additional trait too.
ā
Also you can swap traits with the
parent's traits.
ā
You can drastically alter strength and
their nature by combining various traits.
ā
Think about what sort of monster you
want and then give them those traits.
ā
